title: GoPro Kills Drones, Sliding Cryptocurrencies, CES Infotainment
itunes:title: GoPro Kills Drones, Sliding Cryptocurrencies, CES Infotainment
description:
Jing Cao, Bloomberg News Tech Reporter, discusses GoPro cutting jobs and ending their drone business. John Sarson, Managing Partner at Blockchain Momentum, looks at the recent on slide in cryptocurrencies. Sandy Rowland, CFO at Harman, talks connected car innovations from the Consumer Electronics Show in Vegas. We Drive to the Close with John Augustine, CIO at Huntington Private Bank. Mike Vorhaus, President at Magid Advisors, has more on the innovations and devices to watch at CES. And Carol and Cory hit today’s “Movers and Shakers” on Wall Street. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
